feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:49 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
